summary: Daryl wants to go straight after years in prison. He meets a cute girl who helps him find an honest job driving. He wants to save up and open a nightclub. But then gems and mayhem pop up.
cast: Bokeem Woodbine|Damon Saleem|Cynda Williams|Jeffrey Combs|Shedric Hunter Jr.|Tony Todd|Joseph Granda|Clifton Powell|Jeris Poindexter|Snoop Dogg|Doug Kruse|Darin Scott|Marques Johnson|Jerry Boyd|Michael Clarke Duncan|Basil Wallace|Courtney McLean|Jason Carmichael|LL Cool J|Mather Zickel|George Anthony Baker|Tracy James
title: Acosado
